refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the version of the MySQL server as an integer

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.description;
Procedural style:
intmysqli_get_server_version mysqlilink
Object oriented style (property):
mysqli intserver_version
The mysqli_get_server_version function returns the version of the server connected to (represented by the link parameter) as an integer.
